text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide smart.who.int.base

Profile: SMART Guidelines ImplementationGuide

Base

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://smart.who.int/base/ImplementationGuide/smart.who.int.base

Base SMART Guidelines implementation guide to be used as the base dependency for all SMART Guidelines IGs

name: Base
title: SMART Base
description: Base SMART Guidelines implementation guide to be used as the base dependency for all SMART Guidelines IGs

extension.valueMarkdown: This IG uses CQL profiles and capabilities provided by the Using CQL With FHIR IG
This IG uses content management profiles and capabilities provided by the Canonical Resource Management Infrastructure (CRMI) IG
This IG uses questionnaire profiles and capabilities provided by the Structure Data Capture (SDC) IG

grouping.name: Conformance
grouping.description: constraints and profile structures for SMART Guidelines resources

resource.name: Business Process Workflow (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing Generic Business Processes and Workflows from a DAK. A business process is a set of related activities or tasks performed together to achieve the objectives of the health programme area.

resource.name: Classification of Digital Health Interventions v1
resource.description: Value Set for Classification of Digital Health Interventions v1. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

resource.name: Classification of Digital Health Interventions v1
resource.description: CodeSystem for Classification of Digital Health Interventions v1. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

resource.name: Classification of Digital Health System Categories v1
resource.description: Value Set for Classification of Digital Health System Categories v1. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

resource.name: Classification of Digital Health System Categories v1
resource.description: CodeSystem for Classification of Digital Health System Categories v1. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

resource.name: Core Data Element (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing Core Data Elements from a DAK. Data elements are required throughout the different points of a workflow and are mapped to established concept mapping standards.

resource.name: Decision-Support Logic (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing Decision-Support Logic from a DAK. Decision-support logic and algorithms to support appropriate service delivery in accordance with WHO clinical, public health and data use guidelines.

resource.name: Digital Adaptation Kit (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing a complete Digital Adaptation Kit (DAK) with metadata and all 9 DAK components

resource.name: Dublin Core Metadata Element Set
resource.description: Logical Model representing Dublin Core metadata elements as defined at https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-terms/

resource.name: Functional and Non-Functional Requirements (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing Functional and Non-Functional Requirements from a DAK. A high-level list of core functions and capabilities that the system must have to meet the end users' needs.

resource.name: Functional Requirement (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing functional requirement from a DAK

resource.name: Generic Persona (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing Generic Personas from a DAK. Depiction of the human and system actors. Human actors are end users, supervisors and related stakeholders who would be interacting with the digital system or involved in the clinical care, public health or health system pathway.

resource.name: Health Interventions and Recommendations (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing Health Interventions and Recommendations from a DAK. Overview of the health interventions and WHO, regional or national recommendations included within the DAK.

resource.name: Hierarchy of the Classification of Digital Health Interventions v1
resource.description: Mapping to represent hierarchy within Hierarchy of the Classification of Digital Health Interventions v1.

resource.name: International Standard Classification of Occupations 2008
resource.description: ISCO-08 codes from the International Labour Organization official classification

resource.name: ISCO-08 Value Set
resource.description: Extensible value set of ISCO-08 codes for persona classification

resource.name: LinkIdExt
resource.description: Smart Guidelines link identifier extension

resource.name: Markdown
resource.description: Markdown extension

resource.name: Non-Functional Requirement (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing non-functional requirement from a DAK

resource.name: Persona (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing Personas from a DAK

resource.name: Program Indicator (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing Program Indicators from a DAK. Core set of indicators that need to be aggregated for decision-making, performance metrics and subnational and national reporting.

resource.name: Questionnaire for IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any
resource.description: Auto-generated questionnaire for decision table DAK.DT.IMMZ.D2.DT.BCG

resource.name: Satisfies
resource.description: Indicates that if the conditions for this requirement are satisified, then that it should be viewed as satisifying  the referenced requirement.

resource.name: SGActorExt
resource.description: Smart Guidelines Actor Reference extension

resource.name: SGcode
resource.description: Smart Guidelines code extension

resource.name: SGDocumentation
resource.description: Smart Guidelines Documentation extension

resource.name: SGMarkdown
resource.description: Smart Guidelines markdown extension

resource.name: SGRequirementExt
resource.description: Smart Guidelines Requirements extension

resource.name: SGString
resource.description: Smart Guidelines (required) string extension for use in a complex extension

resource.name: SGTask
resource.description: Extension to reference SMART Guidelines task type

resource.name: SGUserStory
resource.description: Smart Guidelines extension to support structured User Stories (As a <Actor> I want to <capability> so that <benfit>) extension

resource.name: Smart Guidelines Actions (columns) for Decision Tables
resource.description: CodeSystem for Smart Guidelines Documentation Actions for Decision Tables"

resource.name: SMART Guidelines ActivityDefinition
resource.description: The minimum expectations for ActivityDefinition resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Actor
resource.description: Structure and constraints for ActorDefinition resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Business Process
resource.description: Structure and constraints for Business Processes represented in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines CodeSystem
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for CodeSystem resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Communication Request
resource.description: Provide communication

resource.name: SMART Guidelines ConceptMap
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for ConceptMap resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Decision Table
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for PlanDefinition resources used in SMART Guidelines which are derived from DAK Decision Tables

resource.name: Smart Guidelines Decision Table Actions
resource.description: Value Set for Smart Guidelines Documentation Decision Table Actions

resource.name: Smart Guidelines Documentation Section
resource.description: Value Set for Smart Guidelines Documentation Section to autogenerate documentation from artifacts

resource.name: Smart Guidelines Documentation Section
resource.description: CodeSystem for Smart Guidelines Documentation Section to autogenerate documentation from artifacts

resource.name: SMART Guidelines GraphDefinition
resource.description: The minimum expectations for GraphDefinition resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Group Definition
resource.description: Structure and constraints for Group Definitions represented in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines ImplementationGuide
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for ImplementationGuide resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Library
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for Library resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Logical Model
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for Logical Models used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Measure
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for Measure resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Persona Types
resource.description: CodeSystem for SMART Guidelines Persona Types

resource.name: Smart Guidelines Persona Types Value Set
resource.description: Value Set for Smart Guidelines Persona Section to autogenerate documentation from artifacts

resource.name: SMART Guidelines PlanDefinition
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for PlanDefinition resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Questionnaire
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for Questionnaire resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Requirements
resource.description: Smart Guidelines Requirements

resource.name: SMART Guidelines StructureDefinition
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for StructureDefinition resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines StructureMap
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for StructureMap resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Tasks
resource.description:
CodeSystem for SMART Guidelines tasks which are specializations of the Business Process Modeling Notatiton (BPMN) tasks, which are included in this codesystem

See [BPMN Spectification](https://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN) for more info.  The descriptions were adapted from the [normative human readable documentation](https://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/2.0.2/PDF).

resource.name: SMART Guidelines Transaction
resource.description: Structure and constraints for TransactionDefinition resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SMART Guidelines ValueSet
resource.description: Defines the minimum expectations for ValueSet resources used in SMART Guidelines

resource.name: SUSHI Configuration Logical Model
resource.description: Logical model defining the structure of sushi-config.yaml files used for FHIR Implementation Guide configuration. This model captures the essential metadata and configuration parameters needed for IG publishing.

resource.name: Test Scenario (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing Test Scenarios from a DAK. A set of test scenarios to validate an implementation of the DAK.

resource.name: User Scenario (DAK)
resource.description: Logical Model for representing User Scenarios from a DAK. Narratives that describe how the different personas may interact with each other.
